title: The Slaughterman of Love - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Josei   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Abandoned Children   Dark   Female Protagonist   Orphans   R*pe
author: A Candy   一枚糖果
description:
This is a cruel fairy tale in the real world.

When Jiang Youyou, a girl who grew up in an orphanage, went to Shenzhen (City) alone to work, she didn’t expect the unimaginable humiliation and torture awaiting her.

She struggled at the darkest, most terrible corners of society until she met him.

However, it seemed fate was kidding her…>
